text:
My Lit + Vite + Storybook tutorial for HubSpot theme development is LIVE - give it a read if you want a look at how I create performant and responsive websites for the best CMS on the market.

:pushpin: I offer insight at how I set up my HubSpot projects - I provide a starter kit that contains everything you need to create lean and effective websites.

:pushpin: I'll teach you how to standardize and strengthen your websites by separating component development from theme-specific requirements (Hubl, fields, templates, HubDB).

:pushpin: You'll see how I streamline all of my deliveries with Vite and Storybook, in a way that's iterative and in step with design and tight deadlines.

:pushpin: You'll find out why I choose Lit over other frameworks; I don't want to spoil anything, but I think it's a superior choice for modern website development.

Gain from my experience - check out the article here:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/blog/building-snappy-and-responsive-HubSpot-themes-with-lit-and-vite>
